segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點更新

segments.source_content: ### Broken anchors checker

translations.zh-hant: ### 失效錨點檢查器

segments.source_content: In [#9528](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9528), we improved the built-in broken links checker to also detect broken anchors.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#9528](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9528) 中，我們強化了內建的失效連結檢查器，使其能同時偵測失效的頁內錨點。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus blog post social card](./img/broken-anchor.jpg)

translations.zh-hant: ![Docusaurus 部落格文章社交卡片](./img/broken-anchor.jpg)

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Make it fail fast]

The new [`onBrokenAnchors`](/docs/api/docusaurus-config#onBrokenAnchors) option has value `warn` by default, for retro-compatibility reasons.

We recommend to turn it to `throw` and fail your CI builds instead of deploying broken anchors to productions.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[快速失敗機制]

基於向下相容性考量，新的 [`onBrokenAnchors`](/docs/api/docusaurus-config#onBrokenAnchors) 選項預設值為 `warn`。

我們建議將其改為 `throw`，讓 CI 建置過程能因失效錨點而中斷，而非將問題部署至生產環境。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note

For users and plugin authors implementing custom `<Heading>` and `<Link>` components, we provide a new [`useBrokenLinks`](/docs/docusaurus-core#useBrokenLinks) React hook API.

**Most Docusaurus users don't need to care about it**, built-in components (`docusaurus/Link` and `@theme/Heading`) already use it internally.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

針對使用自訂 `<Heading>` 和 `<Link>` 元件的使用者與插件開發者，我們提供了新的 [`useBrokenLinks`](/docs/docusaurus-core#useBrokenLinks) React Hook API。

**多數 Docusaurus 使用者無需關注此功能**，內建元件（`docusaurus/Link` 和 `@theme/Heading`）已內整合此機制。

:::

segments.source_content: ### `parseFrontMatter` hook

translations.zh-hant: ### `parseFrontMatter` 鉤子

segments.source_content: In [#9624](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9624), we added a new [`siteConfig.markdown.parseFrontMatter` function hook](/docs/api/docusaurus-config#markdown).

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#9624](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9624) 中，我們新增了 [`siteConfig.markdown.parseFrontMatter` 函式鉤子](/docs/api/docusaurus-config#markdown)。

segments.source_content: This makes it possible to implement convenient front matter transformations, shortcuts, or to integrate with external systems using front matter that Docusaurus plugins do not support.

translations.zh-hant: 透過此功能，您可以實現便捷的前置資料轉換、快捷操作，或整合 Docusaurus 插件不支援的外部系統前置資料。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_4795a13d

segments.source_content: Read the [front matter guide](/docs/markdown-features#front-matter) and the [`parseFrontMatter` API ref](/docs/api/docusaurus-config#markdown) for details.

translations.zh-hant: 詳見[前置資料指南](/docs/markdown-features#front-matter)與 [`parseFrontMatter` API 參考文件](/docs/api/docusaurus-config#markdown)。

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他變更

segments.source_content: Other notable changes include:

translations.zh-hant: 其他值得注意的變更包括：

segments.source_content:
- [#9674](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9674): add `siteConfig.markdown.remarkRehypeOptions` to pass options to `remark-rehype`, letting you customize things such as MDX footnote label
- [#9671](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9671): add code block MagicComments support for (Visual) Basic/Batch/Fortran/COBOL/ML
- [#9610](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9610): enable CLI port configuration via `PORT` environment variable
- [#9477](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9477): complete Brazilian Portuguese (pt-BR) translations

translations.zh-hant:
- [#9674](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9674)：新增 `siteConfig.markdown.remarkRehypeOptions` 以傳遞參數給 `remark-rehype`，可自訂 MDX 腳註標籤等設定
- [#9671](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9671)：新增對 (Visual) Basic/Batch/Fortran/COBOL/ML 的程式碼區塊魔法註解支援
- [#9610](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9610)：透過 `PORT` 環境變數啟用 CLI 連接埠配置
- [#9477](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9477)：完成巴西葡萄牙語 (pt-BR) 翻譯
